title: 1 Ridza Tsuri
content:
1 Ridza Tsuri

Ridza tsuri yevangeri, Murindi wanyewera;
Avo vanonzwa masoko, Vapinduke, vapone.

CHORUS:
Ridzanyi, murindi, ridza, Pasi pese ridzisa;
Mwari arikuti, Ridza Vasungwi vaponeswa.

Ridza pamakomo ese Mapomo nemikana;
Nepanyanza ridzanyizve, Soko rekuponeswa.

Ridzanyizve pamagwanza, Nenzvimbo dzine dima;
Taura zvakagadzirwa, Baba atidayidza.

Ridza kune vakaneta, Vanoda kuponeswa;
Muponesi wadayidza, Mwese munodikanwa.

title: 2 Petyo Kana Nepam’suvo
content:
2 Petyo Kana Nepam’suwo

Mambo aripo pam’suwo, Iye wafa pamchinjiko;
Asi unowuya zvino Kutora vake’vo.

CHORUS:
Pamsuwo, Pam’suwo, Pam’suwo, Hunde’po pam’suwo;
Anouya, Anouya, hunde ari pam’suwo.

Zviwoneso zvekuuya, Zvino zviri kuitika;
Toona nekukasika Musi wakanaka.

Musanangise pasi’po, Kuti kusine dambudzo;
Dakara Muponesi’wo Auye pasi’po.

Ndizvo mupasi’po itsva, Tichagara nekugara;
Kufa kuchawa kusafa, Haiperi nguva.

title: 3  Usu Neusu
content:
3 Usu Neusu

Tichazoonana usu, NaTenzi toonana;
Ndinodisa kumuona Jesu wakandifira.

CHORUS:
Ndichazomuona Tenzi, Iyo mhiri kwedenga;
Tichazoonana naYe, Gare gare kumusha.

Nhasi handisi kum’ona, Basi nge kudawira;
Asi musi unouya, Jesu uchazoonwa.

Tichafara pamwe naye, Urombo hwazopera;
Ne nzira dzaruramiswa, Zvedima zvacheniswa.

Toonana ngerufaro, Kuona nekuziwa;
Iye Mununuri wangu, Jesu unondidisa.

title: 4 Arikuuya
content:
4 Arikuuya

Soko rakanaka kunesu vafambi, Apo tinoyenda pasi’po;
Asi Muponesi achazouyazve, Kutonga umambo hwake’wo.

CHORUS:
Arikuuya ngekukasika, Jesu zve arikudzoka, Nevafambi vake vachazotorwa, Apo Jesu auya.

Makuva ekare apo vanorara, Vafambi vakafa naKristu;
Vachazarurwazve, vanhu vanomuka, Vachapona pamwe na Jesu.

Tichasangana kumusha’wo kudenga, Tichaimba ngekuponeswa;
Vaponeswi’wo vachabva pasi rese, Vanamate Mambo wedenga.

Hariruya, Amen, nezve Hariruya, Ngekudawira, tichasvika;
Namata, simbira, kufara, dakara, Topfeka mbiri yekudenga.

title: 5 Kure Senyi Kumusha?
content:
5 Kure Senyi Kumusha?

A kurekure kumusha?
Ndabvunza murindi, ati,
Usiku hurikupera,
Kwakuda kuyedza.
Usacheme, kurumidza,
Mutewere, kusimbira;
Muchasvika mukupenya
Hakuna kupera.

Ndabvunza kune mukani,
Anerwiyo rwekushinga,
Ngekushinga ndinokana,
Hondo ichapera.
Musacheme, mutiwire,
Dakara basa rapera,
Tinoziva tinechipo,
Kuti takurira

Ndabvunzazve pasi, zuva,
Zvese zvakandipindura;
Nguva irikundopera,
Jesu anouya.
Musacheme, zviwoniso zve
Zviri kutinyewera,
Zvisikwa zvese zvinoda
Tsuri imborira.

Tiripatyo nekumusha,
Kunofadza kutondera
Chifarai imwi vafambi,
Bvisanyi’wo kutya.
Musacheme, tisangane
Apo kusina kuneta,
Zviyedzo’zvo zvakapera,
Tasvika kumusha

title: 6 Jesu Arikuuya
content:
6 Jesu Arikuuya

Rindanyi’mwi vanoyera,
Zvioneso zvaonekwa
Mwenje yenyu batidzanyi,
Munochingamidza Tenzi

CHORUS
Wonanyi, anouya;
Jesu Mambo anouya,
Anouya kuzotonga,
Wonanyi, anouya.

Wonanyi chitsidzo chake,
Chekuti musunungurwe
Nguwo chena nezviremba,
Kasikanyi kutaura.

Atigadzirira nzvimbo,
Muumambo hwake iyo;
Tauranyizve zvemutsa,
Tsuri isati yaridzwa

Vanyangadzi uyai zvino,
Kristu anotinunura;
Kasika ichipo nguva,
Kristu anoda kuuya.

title: 7 Apo Jesu Anouya
content:
7 Apo Jesu Anouya

Apo Jesu anouya kugashira vake;
Vanhu vake vakanaka, Vanodikanwa.

CHORUS
Senyenyedzi kudenga, Vese vachapenya;
Vachagara naJesu, Wake, kumusha

Vachaunganidza vana veumambo hwake:
Vatereri vakanaka, Vanodikanwa

Vana vese vanodisa Muponesi wavo
Varivake vanokosha, Vanodikanwa

title: 8 Mazita Anodaidzwa
content:
8 Mazita Anodaidzwa

Kuti Tenzi anoridza tsuri yekuguma ’Iyo,
Apo nguva yepasi yapera’wo;
Kuti vakanaka vese vanounganidzwa’po
Mazita anodaidzwa, ndiripo.

CHORUS
Mazita anodaidzwa (3 times)
Anodaidzwa kudenga, ndiripo

Pamusi’wo vanomuka vakafa kuna Kristu,
Vanoona mbiri huru yake’yo
Apo vasarudzwi vanosangana kumusha’ko,
Mazita anodaidzwa ndiripo

Ngatibate basa rake kuti rinozopera;
Ngatishumaire rudo rwaMwari
Ndizvo Jesu anouya kutora vanhu vake,
Mazita anodaidzwa ndiripo

title: 9 Jesu Unouya-Zve!
content:
9 Jesu Unouya-Zve!

Ridzanyi Tsuri neizwi guru;
Jesu unouya zve!
Farai vafambi, tendai, imbanyi;
Jesu unouya zve!

CHORUS
Unouya, unouya, Jesu unouya zve!

Ungiranyizve makomo imwi;
Jesu unouya zve!
Nyenye yakafa ive nembiri;
Jesu unouya zve!

Nyanza taura nemananda’yo;
Jesu unouya zve!
Apo pajecha kunyika dzese;
Jesu unouya zve!

Pasi rinoti nekuteneka;
Jesu unouya zve!
Champupuri’cho nekuvhuvhuta;
Jesu unouya zve!

Ndudzi dzepasi dzinoshatirwa;
Jesu unouya zve!
Ngwaru hwawanda, vanhu vafamba;
Jesu unouya zve!

title: 10 Kusangana Kurwizi
content:
10 Kusangana Kurwizi

Tichasangana kurwizi,
Apo kune kupenya;
Mvura yakanakisisa
Yabva kuna Jehova.

CHORUS
Hunde tosangana iyo,
Parwizi rwakanaka kudenga
Tosangana nevanoyera
Pachigaro chaMwari

Iyo pagombe perwizi,
Rwakabvira kuchena
Tichafamba nekutenda,
Nguva dzese tofara

Kurwizi’rwo runopenya,
Mitoro ticharasa;
Tosunungurwa ngemutsa,
Togashira chiremba

Tosvika nekukasika,
Nerwendo ruchapera;
Mwoyo yedu ichafara,
Ngerwiyo rwekutenda

title: 11 Ndokutewera M’ponesi,
content:
11 Ndokutewera M’ponesi,

Ndokutewera M’ponesi, Kwese’ko ndinogara
Apo imwi munoenda, Hunde ndokutewera

CHORUS
Ndokutewera M’ponesi, Imwi makandifira
Kana vese vakusiya, Ini ndokutewera

Kana nzira inoshata, Kana kusina nzira
Mwaenda pamberi pangu, Ini ndokutewera

Kuti ndaona dambudzo, Zvimwe ini ndaedzwa
Imwizve mwakamboedzwa, Ini ndokutewera

Kana ndawane urombo, Kushaya, kusafara
Ndatondera mwakashaya, Tenzi, ndokutewera

Kuti ndinoona rufu, Musatizve mwauya
Mwakafa, makamboigwa, Ndichiri kutewera

title: 12 Iripo Tsime
content:
12 Iripo Tsime

Iripo tsime izere Neropa raJesu;
Vanyangadzi vasamba’mo, Vanochena naro

Mbavha yokufa yafara Kuona tsime’yo
Kana ini munyangadzi, Ndinochena nayo

Nyenye yaMwari, ropaIro, Harishaye simba
Dakara vanhu vaJesu, Vese vaponeswa

Tenzi ndinodawirazve, Kana ndakatadza
Vandigadzirira chipo, Chawanwa ngeropa

Nekudenga ndichaimba, Ngesimba nerudo
Kuti ngeropa raJesu, Ndaponeswa naro

title: 13 Kuchena Kwazvo
content:
13 Kuchena Kwazvo

O Jesu ndinoda kurapwa kwazvo
Ndinoda imwi mugare mumoyo
Bvisa zvakaipa, dzinga mhandu’yo
Mundisambe ndichachena kwazvo

CHORUS
Ndichachena, ndichene kwazvo
Mundisambidze, ndichachena kwazvo

O Jesu, kudenga nangisa pasi
Mundibatsire ndinopira zvese
Ndinozvipa ini zvese ndinazvo
Mundisambidze, ndichachena kwazvo

Jesu, ndikukumbire nekupfava
Pamakumbo ako, Tenzi ndamira
Ndachena ngeropa nge kudawira
Mundisambidze ndichachena kwazvo

Jesu, ndarindira nekutiwira
Uyo mundipinze nemoyo mutsva
Haurambe vese vakutsvaka’vo
Mundisambidze, ndichachena kwazvo

title: 14 Inzwai Mapeni’wo
content:
14 Inzwai Mapeni’wo

Inzwai mapeni’wo, Arikuiswa
Ese ndeaJesu, Unogashira

CHORUS
Gwendere, Gwendere, Gwendere, Gwendere Ari kuiswa;
Ese ndeaJesu, Unogashira

Arikuiswa’mo, Kubva m’tuwoko;
Tinounza chipo Kuna Jesu’wo

Tirivo vaduku, Tine mapeni;
Zvetava vakuru, Tokupa zhinji

Kana tisina’ba, Tomupa rudo;
Zveunozoruda, Afare narwo

title: 15 Jesu Anondidisa
content:
15 Jesu Anondidisa

Jesu wandidisa’ni,
Randiudza Bhaibheri;
Vana vanomudisa,
Muponesi wavada

CHORUS
Jesu wandida, Jesu wandida
Jesu wandida, Bhuku randiudza

Jesu wakandifira,
Wakasiya’ro denga
Wakauya pasizve,
Kuponesa’vo vese

Jesu wandidisa’ni,
Ndine urombo ini;
Wakazarurira’wo,
Nzira yekudenga’ro

Jesu wandidisa’ni,
Uripetyo’zve neni;
Kuti ndikamuda’ye,
Unozonditorazve

title: 16 Chengetai Tukumbo
content:
16 Chengetai Tukumbo

Nhasi maoko angu,
Ndasamba’wo kwazvo
Ndaapa kuna Jesu,
Kuita basa’ro

CHORUS
Chengetai tukumbo, Apo twafamba;
Zviro’zvo zvaJesu, Basi ndinoda

Nzeve dzangu ndaudza,
Kuterera kunzwa
Zvebasa’ro remutsa,
Zvondingabatsira

Maziso anangisa,
Zvemaoko angu
Arege kunyangadza,
Pam’sana paJesu

title: 17 Rudo Runotifadza
content:
17 Rudo Runotifadza

Rudo runotifadza, Runonatsa nzira
Runoita titeerere, Nekuva nemutsa

CHORUS
Mwari rudo, Tirivana vake, Mwari rudo
Tifanane na’Ye. Rudo runotifadza, Runonatsa
nzira, Runoita titeerere, Nekuva nemutsa

Pasi rine urombo, Kurwara nekufa;
Ngerudo tinobatsira, Vamwe kudawira

Apo basa rapera, Tatorwa kum’soro,
Ngoma yedu tichaimba, NdiJesu nge-rudo

title: 18 Fambanyi MaKristu
content:
18 Fambanyi MaKristu

Ngatifambe tese mubasa iri,
Muchinjiko wake uri pamberi;
Kristu Tenzi wedu uri pamberi,
Pamberi mubasa ngatifambenyi.

CHORUS
Fambanyi maKristu mubasa iri
M’chinjiko waJesu uri pamberi

Chita cha Satani chichakurirwa
Fambanyi pamberi, tine mabasa
Ngerwiyo’rwo rwedu Jesu akudzwa
Ngatiite basa, tinoripedza

Sangano raMwari sehondo huru
Rinoenda mberi pamwe naJesu
Hatipatsaniswe, tese ngerudo
Rusimbiro rumwe nerudzidziso

Umambo hwepasi huchazoputswa
Asi sangano’ro riri kukura
Zano raSatani richakurirwa
Chitsidzo chaKristu chinozogara

Ndizvo imwi vanhu, pamberi kwazvo
Ngatiimbe tese rwerukuriro
Mbiri nerukudzo rwaKristu Mambo
Vanhu nengirozi dzichaimba’yo

title: 19 Iwa Kumurindi Wako
content:
19 Iwa Kumurindi Wako

Mwoyo wangu rinda, Mhandu dziri zhinji
Dzinoda kubvisa imwi, Munzira yaMwari

Rinda, munamate, Musatize hondo,
Itanyi mazuva ese, Jesu ari petyo

Reganyi kufunga, Kuti makurira,
Dakara Jesu auye, Kuzotitambira

title: 20 Muka Moyo Wangu
content:
20 Muka Moyo Wangu

Muka moyo wangu muka,
Fambanyi pamberi
Mwari anokudaidzai,
Kugara narini

Izwi resimba raMwari,
Rinokudaidzai,
Anovapa zvipo zvavo,
Kune vanodisa

Mbovo zhinji dziri petyo,
Dzirikunangisa,
Siya nzira’yo yekare,
Muende kudenga

Muponesi matiisa,
Munzira kumusha,
Kuti apo takwirira,
Tinozokutenda

title: 21 Ndouya Kumuchinjiko
content:
21 Ndouya Kumuchinjiko

Ndouya kumchinjiko,
Upofu neurombo
Handidi chimwe chiro,
Asi ruponeso’rwo

CHORUS
Ndosimbira kunemwi, Nyenye yepaCalvary,
Ndinopfugama pasi, Mundiponese ini

Jesu ndokuchemera,
Moyo wangu waipa,
Jesu’ye wataura,
Ndinozo-kuchenura

Ndapa zvese kunemwi,
Zviro zvese zvepasi
Moyozve nemuviri,
Uve wenyu narini

Ndosimbira kunemwi,
Mune zvitsidzo zvenyu
Zvino ndarapwa ini,
Neropa’ro raKristu

Jesu arikuuya,
Moyo wangu wazara,
Zvino ndakachenurwa,
Mbiri kuna Jehova

title: 22 Kuneni
content:
22 Kuneni

Ndanzwa ngezvikomborero,
Murikuvapa Tenzi,
Vamwe varikugashira,
Madonhwe mundipenyi

CHORUS
Kuneni, Kuneni,
Madonhwe mundipenyi

Musandipfuura Baba,
Kana ndashata ini,
Tenzi, musazondisiya,
Mutsa wenyu ndipenyi

Ndanga ndiri muchitema,
Ndine urombo ini
Moyo wabatwangepasi,
Mundisunungurenyi

Mudzimu musapfuure,
Mapofu murapenyi,
Ita umboyo waJesu,
Runyararo ndipenyi

title: 23 Ndizadze Zvino
content:
23 Ndizadze Zvino

Uyayi Mudzimu Mutsvene,
Zadzanyi moyo wangu,
Uyanyi’wo zvino pano,
Zadzanyi moyo wangu

CHORUS
Uyanyi, zadzanyi, Jesu nemutsa wenyu,
Uyanyi’wo zvino pano, Zadzanyi moyo wangu

Munokwanisa kuzadza,
Moyo wese’wo wangu
Asi ndinokuda Imwi,
Kuzadza moyo wangu

Ndaneta handine simba,
Ndinopfugama kwenyu
Mudzimu usingaperi,
Zadzanyi moyo wangu

Uyanyi mundichenure,
Nyaradza moyo wangu
Zvino murikuita’wo,
Kuzadza moyo wangu

title: 24 Ndinokushaya Nguva
content:
24 Ndinokushaya Nguva

Ndichiri kushaya, Tenzi wangu,
Hakuna izwizve kunga renyu

CHORUS
Ndoshaya nekushaya, Tenzi ndokushaya,
Zvino mundikomborere, Ndinouya

Ndichiri kushaya, Garai petyo,
Handiputswi apo muripano

Ndichiri kushaya, Mudambudzo,
Kana ndikushaya, Murufaro

Ndichiri kushaya, Ndikudisa,
Nezvitsidzo zvenyu munondipa

Ndichiri kushaya, Munoera,
Ndinova wenyu’di, Mwakanaka

title: 25 Ndazvipira Zvese
content:
25 Ndazvipira Zvese

Zvese, Jesu, ndazvipira,
KwaMuponesi wangu,
Ndosimbira nekumuda,
O, chengeta upenyu

CHORUS
Zvese ndikupa, Zvese ndikupa,
Zvese kuna Muponesi, Zvese ndikupa

Zvese, Jesu, ndazvipira,
Tenzi pamberi penyu,
Ndarega pfuma dzepasi,
Mundigashire Jesu

Zvese, Jesu, ndazvipira,
Ndinofanana nemwi,
Ndizadzenyi Mweya wenyu,
Muri wangu M’ponesi

Zvese, Jesu, ndazvipira,
Ndanzwa moto mutsvene,
O, rufaro rweupenyu.
Mbiri, Mbiri kunemwi

title: 26 Sezvo Ndiri
content:
26 Sezvo Ndiri

Sezvo ndiri, asi Jesu,
Pam'chinjiko wandifira,
Nekuti wandidaidza,
Nyenye yaMwari, ndauya

Sezvo ndiri, handiyedzi,
Moyo wangu kuchenesa,
Asi munondiyeresa,
Nyenye yaMwari, ndauya

Sezvo ndiri, ndatambudzwa,
Nekutya nekupokana,
Zvepasi zvinondiyedza,
Nyenye yaMwari, ndauya

Sezvo ndiri, ndinoshaya,
Ndine hurombo, hwebofu,
Asi zvese munondipa,
Nyenye yaMwari, ndauya

Sezvo ndiri, ndinouya,
Kuti mundisunungure
Ngekuti ndinodawira,
Nyenye yaMwari, ndauya

Sezvo ndiri, rudo rwako,
Rwandikurira mumoyo,
Ndiri wako wega zvino,
Nyenye yaMwari ndauya

title: 27 Mutimutse Zve
content:
27 Mutimutse Zve

Tinokukudza, Imwi Mwari wedu,
NdiJesu wakauya kufira isu

CHORUS
Hareruya, Kudza Mwari, Hareruya, Amen,
Hareruya, Kudza Mwari, Mutimutsezve

Tinokukudza, Imwi Mwari wedu,
Wakatipa rujeko, ndi’ye Mudzimu

Mbiri, kukudza, kweNyenye yaMwari,
Wakatiponesa mune zvitadzozve

Mbiri, rukudzo, kunemwi wemutsa,
Wakatitsvaka nokutitungamira

Mutimutsezve, ngerudo izare,
Moyo yese ipfutwe ngemoto m’tsvene

title: 28 Iwanyi nenguva Yekuponeswa
content:
28 Iwanyi nenguva Yekuponeswa

Iwanyi nenguva Yekuponeswa,
Taura naTenzi, Munozogutswa,
Ngeizwi’ro rake Uzadze moyo,
Tsvaka kuna Iye Chikomborero

Iwanyi nenguva Yekuponeswa,
Iwanyi nenguva naJesu ega,
Nekumunangisa, Mufane na’Ye,
Vese vachaona Jesu kunewe

Iwanyi nenguva Yekuponeswa,
Musaenda mberi, asi teverai,
Jesu Muponesi, Anotungamira,
Ndizvo muBhaibheri, Munosimbira

Iwanyi nenguva Yekuponeswa,
Zvese’zvo zvifungo Zvamunoita,
Zvinotungamirwa NdiJesu Kristu,
Zve munogadzirwa Humambo hwedu

title: 29 Garai Neni
content:
29 Garai Neni

Garai neni usiku hwasvika,
Tenzi garai neni kune dima,
Vanditiza vamwe vabatsiri,
Mubatsiri wedu, garai neni

Upenyu hwachimbidza kuguma,
Kufara kwepasi kunopera,
Zvasakara kwazvo zviro zvese,
Usingasakari, garai neni

Ndinomuda Imwi nguva dzese,
Mutsa unokurira muyedzi
Mudonzvo wangu, Mutungamiri,
Mudima, pachena garai neni

Imwi muripo, handityi mhandu,
Handine kuremerwa mushungu
Kufa, guva, kukunda kuripi?
Ndinokurira ugere neni

Misa muchinjiko ndotandadza,
Penya, undinongedze kudenga,
Kwayedza kwazvo, yabva mimvuri,
Mupenyu, mukufa, garai neni

title: 30 Zuva Ririkudoka
content:
30 Zuva Ririkudoka

Zuva riri kudoka,
Pasi rinozorora,
Namata nekutenda,
Usiku hunouya

CHORUS
Yera, Yera, Yera, Tenzi Mwari,
Denga rese nepasi,Zvese zvazara ndimwi,
Tenzi Mwari

Tenzi weupenyu’wo,
We zvese pasi pano,
Mutiunganidze’su,
Mumaoko’wo enyu, Muri pedyo

Apo dima rasviba,
Werudo tichengete,
Moyo yedu ikwire,
Pamberi penyenyedzi, Apo muri

Kuti apo nguva’yo,
Inopera pasi’ko,
Tenzi matibvumira,
Tichapinda kumusha, Wekudenga

title: 31 Zuva Remoyo Wangu
content:
31 Zuva Remoyo Wangu

Zuva rangu, Muponesi,
Kunopenya apo muri
Murambidze zvakaipa,
Zvinozondidzikatira

Apo hope dzandibata,
Maziso angu apfigwa
Ndotondera kuchanaka,
Kuna Jesu kuzorora

Garai neni zuva rese,
Ndichengete nguva dzese,
Garai neni pausiku,
Kanazve murufu rwangu

Ndikomborere ndomuka,
Ndisati ndaenda m’basa,
Ndichanaka nepanzira,
Dakara ndisvike denga

title: 32 Chidziwiro Munguva Yechampupuri
content:
32 Chidziwiro Munguva Yechampupuri

Tenzi ari Dombo redu,
Nechidziwiriro chedu,
Tisatye muzviro zvese,
Nechidziwiriro chedu

CHORUS
Nge-Dombo rinemasimba,
Ngebvute, apo taneta;
Ngewedu kutungamira,
Nechidziwiriro chedu

Bvute redu masikati,
Nechidziwiriro chedu,
Nekupenya pausiku,
Nechidziwiriro chedu

Champupuri chatinera,
Nechidziwiriro chedu,
Kuna Mwari taponeswa,
Nechidziwiriro chedu

O Mwari, Bako redu’wo,
Nechidziwiriro chedu,
Mubatsiri muripetyo,
Nechidziwiriro chedu

title: 33 Iye Anonditungamira
content:
33 Iye Anonditungamira

Wanditungamira Jesu,
Ngemazwi ake emutsa
Zvese’zvo ndinozoita,
Iye anotungamira

CHORUS
Iye anditungamira, Ngeruoko wandibata,
Ini ndinomutevera, Kuti anotungamira

Kana ndabatwa nenhamo,
Zvimwe ndichafara kwazvo,
Nerunyararo, dambudzo,
Anova nerubatsiro

Tenzi, ndibate ngesimba,
Ndizvo handigurugute,
Kwese ndiri ndichafara,
Mwari anotungamira

Kuti basa razopera,
Zvese newe ndakurira,
Kana rufu handizotyi,
Kuti Mwari achineni

title: 34 Kwanaka Nemoyo Wangu

Zvese’zvo hazvibatsiri

Ona maropa anobva
Musoro diti mawoko
Hakuna rudo rumweba
Neurombo hwakadaro

Kana ini ndakashata
Ndasunungurwa naIye
Chiro chimwe handichadi
Asi muchinjiko wake

Kuti ndirinazvo zvese
Zviri chipo chidukuzve
Urwo rudo rwakadaro
Runoda upenyu hwese

title: 100 Jesu Ndishamwari
content:
100 Jesu Ndishamwari

Jesu ndishamwari wedu,
M’takuri wezvitadzo
Isu tinokomborerwa
Unonzwa minamato
O tashaya runyararo
Tinorwadzwa mumwoyo
Kuti tisabvumira’zvo
Zvese kuna Jesu’yo

Kuti isu tinoyedzwa
Zvimwezve tatambudzwa
Tisarasa rudairo
Namata kuna Jesu
Ndiye shamwari wedi’ko
Kutakura dambudzo
Unonzwa kutadza kwedu
Bvumira kuna Jesu

Kuti tashaya masimba
Taneta nemutoro
Muponesi Mubatsiri
Bvumira kuna Jesu
Vashamwari vakushora?
Namata kuna Jesu
Iye unokutambira
Kumbira kuna Jesu

title: 101 Jesu Arikudaidza Iwe
content:
101 Jesu Arikudaidza Iwe

Jesu arikudaidza iwe udzokere kumushazve,
Ngenyi Unoda kufamba kure kubva kurudo Rwake?

CHORUS
Wa...daidza, Wa...daidza,
(Arikudaidza nasi Arikudaidza nasi)
Jesu Arikudaidza iwe namusi
(Jesu Arikudaidza iwe’daidza iwe namusi

Jesu arikumirira iwe, wakaneta Uzorore,
Wunza mitoro yese kwaAri, Unozokomborerwa.

Jesu arikumirira iwe, Uya zvino Uya zvino,
Uunnze zvese zvitema zvako, Uya usanonoke

Jesu arikukuteta iwe, Inzwa zvino mazvi Ake,
Avo vaanonzwa vachafarira, Uyai zvino mwese.

title: 102 Rega Apinde
content:
102 Rega Apinde

Kune mweni pam’siwo za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Ange aripo kare za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Zarura achiripo Zarurira Mutswene Jesu mwana wa Mwari Za ... rura
(Rega apinde Jesu apinde)

Zarura mwoyo wako za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Zarura anga ende Za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Zarurira shamwari Ano kurWira mweya’ Owa newe narini Za ... rura
(Rega apinde Jesu apinde)

Inzwa onyengerera Za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Zwino sarudza Iye Za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Akamira pam’siwo Ano kupa rufaro Zita Rake rokudzwa Za ... rura
(Rega apinde Jesu apinde)

Gashira Wekudenga Za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Achaku’tira m’tambo Za ... rura (Rega apinde Jesu apinde)
Achakusunungura Zwepasi: zwazopera Okutora kumusha Za ... rura
(Rega apinde Jesu apinde)

title: 103 Makafanira Kubarwa Zwe
content:
103 Makafanira Kubarwa Zwe

Mutongi akauya kuna Jesu, Kuzo bvunza nenzira yeupenyu;
Tenzi Akamupindura Akati, "Barwa nyi zwe patswa," (patswa)

CHORUS
Barwa nyizwe patswa, (patswa) Barwa nyizwe patswa, (patswa)
Nge idi, idi ndinoti kunewe, "Barwa nyizwe patswa" (patswa)

Vana vevanhu tereranyi izwi, Rataurwa nedi na Jesu Tenzi,
Usaite iri soko re nhando, "Barwa-nyizwe patswa" (patswa)

Imwi muchapinda munezororo, Munoimba rwiyo newa poneswa,
Muwane upenyu husinga gumi, "Barwa-nyizwe patswa." (patswa)

title: 104 Uya Mununuri Uya
content:
104 Uya Mununuri Uya

Ndinzwe Tenzi muwe nemutsa neni; Mununuri Uyai
Mweya wangu unodisa Imwi; Mununuri Uyai

CHORUS
Ndapumhuka kure kumakomo; Ndapumhuka kure nemusha,
Onditorei ndipinzei mudanga Mununuri Uyai

Handinaba nzwimbo yekurara Mununuri Uyai,
Nditarisai Ndawane Upenyu: Mununuri Uyai.

Nzira yangu inondi tambudza, Mununuri Uyai
Ndakatarisira rudo rwenyu, Mununuri Uyai.

Musarase kuzwishora kwangu, Mununuri Uyai.
Mundi nzwe mukunamata kwangu, Mununuri Uyai.

title: 105 Anokwanisa Kununura
content:
105 Anokwanisa Kununura

Angatinunura! Daidzira kwese; Ano vanunura vanonzwa;
Mumoyo mukuru, wevanyangadzi, Jesu onunura ano uyayo.

CHORUS
Anotinunura, Anoponesa. Uri hama yangu, Dawira Jesu.

Angatinunura! Ngezwedi here? Kune Simba here ringanunura
Ndiudze neidi aka urawa Angandiponesa kuna Satani

Angakununura shinga usatye, Mushandire Jesu; Anoponesa
Usatye Satani, Simba na Jesu, Usazopokane shinga umire

title: 106 Tinowakira Padombo
content:
106 Tinowakira Padombo

Tinozowakira paDombo, Jesu Dombo remako...re
Tinozomira takashinga, Cham’pupuri Chouya,

CHORUS
Tozo...wakira paDo...mbo Kristu
(Tozowakira padombo Kristu) (Tozowakira padombo Kristu)
(Pamve) Tozowakira padombo Kristu, Padombo guru.

Vamwe vanowaka pajecha, Pandangariro dzepfuma;
Vamwe pachitema nehondo, Pambiri nerufaro.

O wakira paDombo redi; Nheyo yedi yakasimba,
Rine vimbo inokurira; vimbo yeruponeso.

title: 107 Ndiudze Nyaya YaJesu
content:
107 Ndiudze Nyaya YaJesu

Ndiudze nyaya yaJesu, Uyi nyore mumwoyo;
Udza nyaya inokosha, Yakanakisa kwazvo.
Kuti ngirosi dzaka i-mbira Tenzi abarwa,
Mbiri kudenga kum’soro Runyararo mupasi.

CHORUS
Ndiudze nyaya yaJesu Nyora mumwoyo wangu;
Iyi nyaya inokosha Yakanakisa kwazwo.

Kutsanya kwake mugwenya Ndiudze misi yake,
Achititambu dzikira Akakunda chitema,
Ndiudze nebasa rake Nekutambudzwa kwake;
Akashorwa nekurwadzwa Akarambwa nevese.

Nekurowera kwavo, Nekurwadziwa kwake;
Neguva vakamuwiga Nezvekumuka kwake;
Nyaya yerudo rwaJesu Iwe pachena kwazvo;
Ndiudze ini ndicheme Rudo rwakanditenga.

title: 108 Jesu Mufudzi Unodiwa
content:
108 Jesu Mufudzi Unodiwa

Jesu ari Mufudzi, anokudaidza
Mukati me-danga’mo kuchine nzvimbo.
Uya kuchinasi uno apo uchimutsva,
Pinda muiro danga, danga iro redi.

CHORUS
Nge rudo Jesu anodaidza, Mfambi zve uya zvino;
Ari kundirekerera ini, Jesu Mufudzi wangu.

Jesu ari Mufudzi, wakafira iwe
Anodaidza zvino, Mfambi uya kuneni;
Kunze kune dambuzo, uya unodanwa,
Pinda muiro danga, danga iro redi.

Pinda, usanonoke, kunze kune mhumi,
Dzinozokukuwadza, dzakapanduka kwazvo.
Jesu ari Mufudzi, anokudaidza,
Pinda muiro danga, danga iro redi.

title: 109 Wayerwa Unoreruka
content:
109 Wayerwa Unoreruka

Apo m’tongi otiyera, Kana takafanira
Tichamira sendarama, Kana senhando here?

CHORUS
Tichazoyerwa nem’temo Tichareruka
Tichazoyerwa naTenzi Tichareruka

Tonzwa mazwi erufa-ro: "Waita zvakanaka!"
Kana mazwi anotyisa; "Hauna kukwanira?"

Ngatinzwe mweya mutsvene Apo tichada mutsa,
Kana tanonoka Mwa-ri, Anounza magumo?

title: 110 Wakakomborerwa Awo Wanoita
content:
110 Wakakomborerwa Awo Wanoita

Inzwa mazwi aMuponesi Ndiwo mazwi eupenyu.
Inzwa utondere Jesu akati, "Vakomborerwa vaiti."

CHORUS
Vakakomborerwa vakarurama, komborerwa, komborerwa,
Vakakomborerwa vano’ta m’temo komborerwa, komborerwa.

Hakutibatsiri kunzwa kwedu mitemo nezvitsidzo;
Kuzvinzwa, kuzviita hakuponesi; Vakomborerwa vanoita.

Vanozopinda mumusha vakasunungurwa zviitema
Vasukwa, nembiri, zvino narini, Vanodya muti veupenyu.

title: 111 Hakuna Mumwe
content:
111 Hakuna Mumwe

Hakuna hama kupinda Jesu, Hakuna, neimwe!
Hakuna umwe kurapa vese, Hakuna, neumwe!

CHORUS
Anoziva nanhamo Jesu, Anotungamira tese,
Hakuna umwe kupinda Jesu, Hakuna!neumwe.

Hakuna umwe mukuruzveba, Hakuna ne-umwe!
Asi Anozviita muduku, Hakuna neumwe!>

Hakuna nguva asipo Iye, Hakuna neimwe:
Kana usiku rudo ruripo, Hakuna neimwe.

Hakuna umwe akamborambwa, Hakuna neimwe! neumwe!
Kana munyangadzi ha’murambi, Hakuna!neumwe!

Hakuna chipo chikuruzveba, Hakuna nechimwe!
Hangatinyimi musha kudenga, Hakuna neumwe!

title: 112 Upenyu Mukutarisa
content:
112 Upenyu Mukutarisa

Pamuchinjiko pane upenyu, Jesu Ati, "Nditarise."
Pasi nepfuma ngezvenhando, Pamberi ndoona zvakanaka.

CHORUS
Mune u-penyu muku-tarisa muchinjiko.
(Upenyu m’kutarisa pam’chinjiko vaKristu,)
Upenyu hwakanaka kutarisa Kalvari
(Upenyu hwakanaka tarisa paKalvari, pakalvari.)

Apo ndakamutarisa Jesu, Iye Akanyemwerera,
Kuti ndava mumatambudzo, Muchinjiko unondisimbisa.

Ndinozotarisa muchinjiko, Ndosimbira muchinjiko;
Hakuna anozoputsika Vanosimbira simba redenga.

title: 113 Achidaidza
content:
113 Achidaidza

Jesu arikudanira kumusha, kudana iwe neni,
Arindira pamusiwo nemwoyo, Rindira iwe neni.

CHORUS
Uya kum’sha, Imi maneta uya.
(Uya) (Kum’sha)
Jesu arikumudaidza kwazvo, O munyangadzi uya

Musanonoke achimudaidza Kunyengerera imwi,
Ngenyiko tisinganzwi mutsa wake, Mutsa kunewe Nemi.

Nguwa irikukasika kupfu’ra Kupfu’ra iwe neni,
Bvute, nedima, rufaro zvouya Uya kunewe neni

Funga ngerudo akatitsidzira Tsidzira iwe neni
Kana takatadza \‘nosunungura, Osunungura tese.

title: 114 Zambara Razarurirwa Ini
content:
114 Zambara Razarurirwa Ini

Zambara rakazarurwa Kuti ini ndipinde;
Muchinjiko waM’ponesi Tichauona apo.

CHORUS
Mutsa wakadzama kwazvo kuti andizarurire,
Ini...ini...Rasiyirwa ini.
(Ini) (ini.)

Zambara rakazarurwa Kuti vese vapone.
Vapfumi kana varombo, madzinza kana ndudzi.

Pamberi ngatifambenyi, richakandozarurwa,
Gashiranyi rudo Rwake, Chiremba nem’chinjiko.

Hunde mhiriyo kwerwizi Totura muchinjiko
Totakura ‘cho-chiremba Toda Mwari kudenga.

title: 115 Murapi Mukuru
content:
115 Murapi Mukuru

Murapi m’kuru uripo we mutsa, ndiye Jesu.
Anofarisa warombo, Inzwai izvi raJesu.

CHORUS
Zita Rake ritendzwe, Zita rake rikudzwe
Zita Rake riimbwe; Jesu hunde Jesu

"Zwitadzo zwa sunungurwa" Inzwai izwi raJesu.
Fambanyi naYe kudenga, Tigere’ko naJesu.

Mbiri kuNyenye yaMwari, Ndinodawira Jesu,
Ndinodisa zita iri raMuponesi Jesu.

Zwimwe ndatadza ndinoda Kunzwa zita ra Jesu,
Mwoyo wangu wanyaradzwa Ngezita’ro ra Jesu.

Apo iye achauya nembiri ne upenyu,
Tichafara kutaura ruponeso rwaJesu.

title: 116 Hamuna Nzvimbo YaJesu
content:
116 Hamuna Nzvimbo YaJesu

Uzerea ne kunetswa, Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?
Wabatwa nemirau, Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?
O, Amire pamusiwo, O gugudza-gugudza!
Munzwe onyengerera Ha’na nzwimbo ya Jesu?

Unopambadza nguwa, Hana basa ra Jesu?
Usapambadza Simba, Ha’na basa raJesu?
Hauyedzi kukunda, Kana kuwana Mweya;
Daidza warasika; Ha’na basa raJesu?

Unotswaka upfumi, Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?
Usinga bati basa, Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?
Rufaro ne upfumi, Ndizvo zviro unoda,
Kuyedza kuzvifadza; Ha’na nguva ya Jesu?

Watakura zvenhando, Ha’na m’chero va Jesu?
Haunaba misumbu, Ha’na m’chero va Jesu?
Hauna kana chiro, kuripa basa rako;
Hauwani rufaro, Wokumbana na Jesu?

title: 117 Ndirikuuya Tenzi
content:
117 Ndirikuuya Tenzi

Ndanzwa izwi renyu, Randidana Tenzi;
Ndigeze neropa renyu, RepaKalvari,

CHORUS
Ndouya Tenzi! Uya kunemwi;
Ndigezei neropa, RepaKalvari.

Handina masimba, Munondisimbisa;
Mondigezisa ndichene, Ndichene sechero,

Jesu ondidaidza, kune runyararo,
Kurudo nerusimbiro, rwepasi nedenga.

Rukudzo muropa, Kudzai tsitsi dzake,
Kudzai Chipo cha Tenzi, Arisimba Redu.

title: 118 Jesu Akaripa Zwese
content:
118 Jesu Akaripa Zwese

Muponesi ati, "Hauna masimba,"
Rinda unamate, Ndinokupa zvese.

CHORUS
Jesu M’nunuri, zvese ngezwake,
Zvitema zvakatsvuka "zwachena Sechero"

Tenzi ndazoona Munesimba rese,
Munobvisa hosha ne mwoyo we dombo.

Handina kunaka kungadiwa tsitsi,
Nguwo ya-ngu ndogeza muropa renyenye.

Pachigaro chenyu ndichamiranemi,
Ndicha isa zwese pamakumbo Ake.

title: 119 Nanda Rinochenisa
content:
119 Nanda Rinochenisa

Ndinoona nanda dzvuku Tsime rakadzama,
Jesu Tenzi Muponesi Wakatifirayo.

CHORUS
Tsime iro ndoriwona Iro rinondichenesa;
Kudza Tenzi! Rochenesa, Kudza Tenzi rochenesa.

Nda wona upenyu hutswa Ndanzwa ropa Rake;
Zwitema zwese zwapera Apo patsimero.

Ndamuka ndaitwa mutswa Nembiri yedenga;
Ne mwoyo nenguwo chenaa Na Kristu mandiri

Chishamiso tsitsi dzake, Ropa Rake pasi;
Muziwenyi Jesu chete wakati nunura.

title: 120 Ndinodayira
content:
120 Ndinodayira

Baba ndouya kwamuri; Hakuna umwezwe!
Kuti mandisiya ndeda; O ndinoendepi.

CHORUS
Ndodaira iye zvino, Jesu wandifira,
Ropa Rake raparara, kuchenesa ini.

Mwana wenyu ndom’daira, ndinzwe simba renyu,
Zvidiso zvangu zvazadzwa, mune ino nguva.

Muvambi verudairo, Ndotarisa imwi,
Ndogashira chipo chenyu; Ndiponeswe nacho.

title: 121 Ndichaimba Ne Rudo RwaJesu
content:
121 Ndichaimba Ne Rudo RwaJesu

Ndicha i...mbira Jesu Iye wa...kandidisa
(Ndicha-i...) (Iye wa...)
Akari...siyadenga Akafa pa Kari-va-ri
(Akari...)

CHORUS
Ndoimba...rudo rwaJesu, Ndomuku...dzanarini
(Ndoimba...) (Ndomuku...)
Wakandi...fira ini Ndoimba rudo rwake
(Wakandi...)

Ndisati...ndachema Jesu aka...ndichemera
(Ndisati Suaka)
Ndisati...ndanamata Akandi namatira
(Ndisati)

Okudza...makwerudo Hakuzi...kanwikwese
(Okudza...) (Hakuzi...)
Kutizwi...tema zvangu Zvacheneswa sechero
(Kutizwi)

Handina...rudo rwaJesu Ndomuku...dza narini
(Handina) (koaka)
Tenzi mwo...yo waneta Ndizadzeyi nerudo
(Tenzimwo)

title: 122 Petyo, Kune Mwi Tenzi
content:
122 Petyo, Kune Mwi Tenzi

Petyo, Petyo, ne mwoyo venyu, Ndiswendedze imwi munokosha
Ndifungatireyi paditi, Ndiyige muninga, yezororo,
Ndiyige "Muninga, yezororo."

Petyo, Petyo, handina chiro chemupiro kuna Jesu mambo;
Chete mwoyo unechitema, Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu;
Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu.

Petyo, Petyo, zve kuva wenyu, Ndino siya zvese zvechitema
Rufaro rwacho, nekuzvida, Ndipenyi Jesu
Akarowerwa, Ndipenyi Jesu akarowerwa

Petyo, Petyo, ndichikupona, Dakara ndiswike m’mbiri
Yenyu, Ndinozowa wenyu narini,
Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi,Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi

title: 123 Rita Rinoyera
content:
123 Rita Rinoyera

Zita rakanakisisa, rinopfuura ese,
Rakapiwa naye Baba, Kumu Rubgwana Wake.

CHORUS
Iro rinoyera; Zita rinoyera
(Royera!)(Royera!)
Rabva kuna Baba, Ra’ya pasi
Rauya ne ngirosi; Ra’ya pausiku
(Royera) (Royera)
Zita ra Tenzi Jesu.

Rounza chikomborero, Ndoimba ndichifara,
Zita Rake ndoribvuma, Ndichazoriparidza.

Nyaya yerusununguro nerudo ndichaimba
Ndichazo rikudza zita rinopfuura ese.

title: 124 Kwete Ini Asi Kristu
content:
124 Kwete Ini Asi Kristu

Kwete ini Asi kudzai Kristu;
Asi Kristu Azihwe akudzwe:
Kristu chete mubasa redu rese;
Kristu basi mukufunga kwese.

Kwete ini Anonyaradza,
NdiKri-stu A-nobvisa masodzi;
NdiKri-stu A-nosimudza mutoro;
Ndiye Kristu Anodzinga kutya;

Kristu basi ha’tauri zwenhando;
Kristu basi Asina nyongano:
Kristu basi Asingazwi kudzi ba;
Kristu basi Ini ndisa onwe.

Handi-ni-ndi Kristu A ndipa zwese;
Handini ndi-Kristu \‘andipa simba;
Kristu chete Asimbisa muwiri,
Kristu chete, Dakara narini.

title: 125 Kujeka Mumwoyo
content:
125 Kujeka Mumwoyo

Kune kupenya mugomo, nekupenya munyanza,
Nemaranzi anogara Munzwimbo dzakanaka,
Mukati memwoyo wangu mazadzwa nekujeka,
Apo pana Muponesi pano jekesa kwese.

CHORUS
O! kupenya kwakanaka kupenyera mu mwoyo,
Jesu ano bvisa nhamo anopenya mumwoyo.

Ndosiya kusuwa kwangu Senguwadzo dzekare;
Ndifukidze nekutenda mundipenyikutenda.
Kumusha wembiri uyo makandigadzirira;
Mwoyo wangu unotenda ne mweya unobvuma.

Muponesi manditenga ndawawenyu narini;
Ngayipfute mwenje yese ipfutire iye Tenzi.
Kumusha wembiri uyo makandigadzirira;
Mwoyo wangu uno tenda nemweya unobvuma.

title: 126 Sezwo Ndaponeswa
content:
126 Sezwo Ndaponeswa

Ndine ngoma yandinoda sezwo ndaponeswa;
Yamununuri naMambo Sezwo ndaponeswa.

CHORUS
Sezwo-ndaponeswa, Sezwo ndaponeswa
Ndokudza Muponesi, Sezwo ndaponeswa,
Ndokudza zita raM’ponesi

Ndina Kristu Oyerisa sezwo ndaponeswa.
Rudo rwake ndurudisa sezwo ndaponeswa.

Ndine mbowo yakanaka sezwo ndaponeswa.
Anodzinga kutya kwese Sezwo ndaponeswa.

Andi gadzirira musha sezwo ndaponeswa,
Kwandicha gara narini sezwo ndaponeswa.

title: 127 Anoda Zwe Ini
content:
127 Anoda Zwe Ini

Mwari avona kashiri kaputsika pasi;
Kuti achida kashiri Anodazve ini.

CHORUS
Anondida, anondida, anondida ini,
Anoda zviduku zvese, anodazve ini.

Anogadzira maruva akanaka kwazvo;
Kuti anoda maruva anodazve ini.

Mwari wakasika zvese, shiri ne maruva,
Haachakanganwi tupwere, Twese anotuda.

title: 128 Yakakomborerwa Nguwa Yemunamato
content:
128 Yakakomborerwa Nguwa Yemunamato

Nguwa yekunamata mwoyo uno pfawa
Touya kuna Jesu M’ponesi wedu
Nekutenda touya, Kuchishangu chedu
Orapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo

CHORUS
Mukunamata Tinokomborerwa
Orapa wakaneta Zvakanaka kuwayo.

Nguwa yekunamata, Tenzi oswedera
Ane tsitsi kunzwa vana vachichema
Zvese tinozviisa pamakumbo ake
Orapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo

Nguwa yekunamata, apo vano yedzwa
Toisa kuna Tenzi anobatsira
Nemwoyo wekunzwira obvisa zvinetso
Orapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo.

Panguwa yem’namato Tinomusimbira
Zwikomborero zwese tinozwiwana;
Mukusimbira iye hakuna dambudzo
Orapa wakaneta, Zvakanaka kuwayo.

title: 129 Jesu Huya Utikomborere
content:
129 Jesu Huya Utikomborere

Jesu imi mati "Pakaungana, Wawiri, watatu, munozowapo"
Tinomudaira, Tomunamata; Jesu uyai muzotikomborera.

CHORUS
Jesu u-ya uzo tikombo-rere Je-su kombo-rera, Ugare petyo.

Je-su makasangana nesu kare Asi iwa ne-su nekumagumo
Uya Muponesi, mutipe tsitsi; Tenzi tigashire; tino namata.

Ita mazwi edu amuimbire Inzwa zvikumbiro zvedu kunemwi;
Simbisa rudairo rwedu kunemwi, Chenesai rudo nzira ijeke.

title: 130 ’Ndiri Wenyu Tenzi’
content:
130 ’Ndiri Wenyu Tenzi’

Ndiri wenyu Tenzi, Ndanzwa Izwi, Rataura nerudo,
Ndinoda kusimba murudairo. Ndiwe petyo nemwi.

CHORUS
Ndipfuwe-nyi Petyo naTenzi: (Pe-tyo pe-tyo)
Petyo nemuchinjiko. Ndipfuwenyi ndiwe
Petyo naTenzi, Petyo nedivi renyu.

Ndipirenyi kubasaro renyu, nesimbaro retsitsi
Mweya wangu utarise imwi, nerudo ruwe rwenyu.

Ndine rufaro Tenzi panguva ndiri-pamberi penyu,
Ndichipfugama nemwizve Mwari Tichitaurirana.

Kune rudo rwondisingazivi, Dakara ndiswikeko;
Rufaro rwo-ndisingasvikiri, Dakara ndiwe nemwi.

title: 131 Ndifanane NaJesu
content:
131 Ndifanane NaJesu

Ngandifane naJesu
Ave Mponesi wangu
Ndizadzenyi nerudo
Ndipfawire senjiwa
Ngandifambe saJesu
Murwendo rweripasi
Ndiri murombo m’mweyo
Garai neni Mponesi

Kana achinzwa shiri
Dzimwe dzichiputsika
Adzi itire mutsa
Ngeidi anondinzwa wo
Anonditungamirira

Mu-ku-dze-nyi Ngirosi huru yembiri;
Mupe iye simba nerukudzo!
Jesu mufudzi ne mutungamiriri,
Ano tungamira nguva dzese.

CHORUS
Mu-ku-dze-nyi! Taura ukuru hwake!
Mu-ku-dze-nyi!’Imba ne rufaro.

Mu-ku-dze-nyi! Jesu mununuri wedu!Akatifi-razvitema zvedu;
Dombo redu, tariro yeruponeso!
Mu-ku-dze-nyi Jesu, arowerwa ipambiri!
Akatisunungura,
Rudo rwake runoshamisa.

Mu-ku-dze-nyi!, Jesu mununuri wedu!’
Wekudenga woimba, Hosana!
Jesu Tenzi,Achazotonga narini;
Mupe ch’remba, Mupristi naMambo!’
Kristu ouya achazotonga pasi
Simba, mbiri zvose ngezva Tenzi.

title: 229 Ndiani Osarudza Tenzi
content:
229 Ndiani Osarudza Tenzi

Ndiyani Osarudza Tenzi Nzira mbiri chisarudza!

CHORUS
Chi...sa...ru...dza,
(Musarudze nhasi, masarudze nhasi),
Pakati pe’di nechitema.

Zvuru zvasarudza kumira, Kurutivi-rwo rwechitema.

Uyayi, mirayi naTenzi, Ndiye chete ane-upenyu.

title: 230 Ini Ndini Nzira
content:
230 Ini Ndini Nzira

Tese taita sehwayi dzapumhuka kure;
Ndingaona senyi nzira yekuva mudanga?

CHORUS
Ndi...rinzira...,Idi...upenyu...
(Ndirinzira, ndirinzira, Ndirinzira Idi upenyu)
Hawu uyi kuna Baba asineni.
Ndiri...rinzira...,Idi...upenyu...
(Ndirinzira, ndirinzura, Ndirinzira Idi upenyu)
Hawu uyi kuna Baba aineni.

Ndatenderedzwa nenhamo Mwari anondinzwa;
Apo wazhinji wochema, Ndoziva senyi idi?

Kuna Kristu nzira nedi, Handicha pumhuki;
Ondi isa kuna Baba; Kumusha wembiri

title: 231 Rega Jesu Auye Mumwoyo Wako
content:
231 Rega Jesu Auye Mumwoyo Wako

Kuti waremerwa nechitema
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo
Kuti uchida upenyu hutsva
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo

CHORUS
Kwapera kupokana,
Nhasi usa murambe
Chizarura musiwo,
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo

Kana uchida kuchenurwa
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo
Aripo matsime ekusambwa
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo

Kana wanetsva nematambudziko
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo
Kana mumwoyo muyine nzwimbo
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo

Kuti shamwari dzisine idi?
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo
Anova shamwari yakanaka
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo

Uchida kuimba nevatsvene
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo
Woda kupinda mune zororo
Bvumira Jesu mumwoyo

CHORUS


Kwapera kupokana,
Handicha murambizve
Ndazarura musiwo,
Jesu apinda mumwoyo

title: 232 Handi Zomusiyi Imwi
content:
232 Handi Zomusiyi Imwi

Handizokusiyi iwe
Handizokurambiba
Ndinozokutungamira
Pamusana petsitsi
Usatyeba chakaipa
Tora mazano angu

Apo mhepo yakubata
Ndidane m’munamato
Ndichakugumbatira iwe
Ndikutungamirire
Ndicharuramisa nzira yako
Muzviyedzozvo

Kuti denga rapenya
Kose, kose kwajeka
Rufaro rwozoyerera
Zvino zvose zvofara
Ini ndinozova newe
Ndinokutungamira

Kana mwoyo wa’ne dima
Wazara kupokana
Ndinozokujekesera
Nemukati memhute
Mureza mureza
Ini ndinozousimudza

title: 233 Ndiudze Nyayayekare
content:
233 Ndiudze Nyayayekare

Nd’udze nyaya yekare, Yezviro zvekudenga
Yekupenya kwaJesu, Nerudo rwaJesu
Taura nyaya zvinyoro, Semwana muduku
Zvondiri wakane Ndisisinasimba

CHORUSNd’udze nyaya yekare, Nd’udze nyaya yekare
Nd’udze nyaya yekare, Yerudo rwaJesu

Nd’udze nyaya yekare,Neinzwi reidi
Funga ini mutadzi,Akafirwa naye
Ndiudze nguva dzese Kuti uchizowa munyaradzi
Panguva yematambudziko

Nd’udze nyaya yekare, Une zvaunotya
Pasi risinambiri, Rinondi konjera (womera)
Hunde nyika yembiri, Iri kuwonekwa
Nd’udze nyaya yekare! Jesu ochenura

title: 234 Jesu Mwenje Wepasi
content:
234 Jesu Mwenje Wepasi

Ngirosi dzinoimba, Jesu mwenje wepasi
Mbiri kunaye mambo, Jesu mwenje wepasi

CHORUSFamba mumwenje, Uya kumadonhwe ane tsitsi
Uti penyere nguva nenguva, Jesu mwenje wepasi

Ndudzi dzese farayi, Jesu mwenje wepasi
Farayi newedenga, Jesu mwenje wepasi

Wedenga womukudza, Jesu mwenje wepasi
Kristu Tenzi narini, Jesu mwenje wepasi

Muchinda werukudzo, Jesu mwenje wepasi
Zuva rekururama, Jesu mwenje wepasi

title: 235 Musi Wadzokazve
content:
235 Musi Wadzokazve

Musi wezororo wauya zve
Wakakomborerwa pakusika
Apo Tenzi akamisa basa
Kuti zvese zvive murunyararo

Kuti misirenyi, Uyu musi
Kudzidza kuita rudo rwake
Ano tinzwa Apo tinokwidza
Minamato, zve nenzwiyo nzedu

Chitinzwayi Tenzi wemapasi
Nemutsa chinzwayi vana venyu
Tonderayi nechitsidzo chenyu
Pangidzayi vanhu tsitsi dzenyu

Baba imwi muri vimbo yeduMunotirwira, M’notungamiraMuri m’chengeti wedu mu’penyuNgandiwe wenyu narini Baba

title: 236 Mutsa Wake Werudo
content:
236 Mutsa Wake Werudo

Muka mwoyo murufara, Imba rukudzo rwaTenzi
Anoda ndimuimbire, Mutsa wake wakanaka

CHORUS
Mutsa wake wakanaka, Mutsa wake wakanaka

Akandivona muzvivi, Akandidisisa kwazvo
Ndiye akandiponesa, Mutsa wakanaka

Kana mukati memhandu, Kana pasi rindishore
Anotungamira mweya, Mutsa wake wakanaka

Kanapo matambudziko, Azowandisisa seyi
O mira nemweya wangu, Mutsa wakanaka

title: 237 Simukiranyi Jesu
content:
237 Simukiranyi Jesu

Simukiranyi Jesu, Warwi wem’chinjiko
Musimudze mureza, Musingaurasi
Mukunde nekukunda, Achitungamira
Mhandu dzese dzitize, Kristu iye Tenzi

Simukirayi Jesu, Wadainzwa uya
Pindayi mukukana, Nemusi wembiri
Warume m’musandiire, Kukana nemhandu
Singayi mudambudzo, Murwise nesimba

Simukirayi Jesu, Vimba simba rakeHondo ichakukunda, UsazvisimbireChipfekayi vhangeri, Namata urindeWodanwa kudambudzo, Usazoshayikwe

Simukirayi Jesu, Hondo ichaperaKune mhere yehondo, TichazokuriraKune achakurira, Opiwa chirembaAchatonga naMambo, Nekusingaperi

title: 238 Varikupinda MuJerusalem Itsva
content:
238 Varikupinda MuJerusalem Itsva

Ndiyani awo wanoungana, Pamberi pechigaro chaMwari
Wanokudzazve Jesu, Nemaropa eNyenye

CHORUS
Varikupinda muJerusalem idzva, Vasambwa nemaropa eNyenye
Varikupinda muJerusalem idzva, Nemaropa eNyenye

Vakadavira m’zita raJesu, Vamwe vavo vachiri vaduku
Vakanzwa tsitsi dzake, Nemaropa eNyenye

Avo vakanzwa zvemadambudzo, Jesu wakavapa runyararo
Kuzorora mumweya, Nemaaropa eNyenye

Vakaita mubasa raJesu, Vakana kukana kwakanaka
Vachafara narini, Nemaropa eNyenye

Vaponeswa vamira panynza, Chitema kufa zvese zvapera
Rufarozve narini, Nemaropa eNyenye

title: 239 Wakaneta Here?
content:
239 Wakaneta Here?

Wakaneta watambudzwa mumwoyo here
Uya kuneni uwane zororo

Aneyi chinganditungamira kwaari?
Mavanga mumavoko nemakumbo

Anopfeka chiremba cherukudzo here?
Hunde chiremba cheidi chemhinzwa

Ndinowaneyi mukumutevera iye?
Nhamo nematambudziko mazhinji

Anondipeyi mukusimbira kwaari?
Anopedza urombo nekuchema

Iye anoramba kundigashira here?
Anokubvuma zvepasi zvapera

Anokomborera here mukumutsvaka
Vese vatsvene vopindura Hunde

title: 240 Ona Tenzi Pamusiwo
content:
240 Ona Tenzi Pamusiwo

Ona Tenzi pamusiwo!, Anogugudza zvinyoro
Yavenguva akamira, Usa shore Tenzi wako

Atitenga kwari zvese, Ndatama nenguvo chena
Zora maziso uone, Bvisa zvese zvakaipa

Inzwa inzwi’ro rembowo, Anokupa kusarudza
Iwe unodziya chete, Chigadzira nzira dzako

Basa rake ra’kupera, Tsitsi dzake dza’kupera
Akaipa nga’pezve, Anoera ayerezve

Muviri wake \‘nedova, Anokumirira iwe
Muka, zarura musiwo, Da’dza mudiwa apinde

Chimupinza mweni wako, Ugozorora maari
Ukumbanirane Naye, Ugozodya pamwe naye

title: 241 Nyika Ye Kenani
content:
241 Nyika Ye Kenani

Kune nyika yakanaka, Rufaro rwayo ngerwangu
Kune zuva rinopenya, Dima repasi rapera

CHORUS
Nyika iyo yeKenani!, Ndinodisa kusvikayo
Ndichaona zvakanaka zvenyikayo iri yangu
Ine dzimba dzagadzirirwa ini iko kudenga

Tenzi ozofamba neni, Kusangana kweukama!
Ndiye anotungamira, Munyika’yo yerufaro

Kunhuwira kwakanaka, Kunozobva kune miti
Nemaruva akanaka, Kune mvura yeupenyu

Denga rese rozara, Nenzwiyo dzakanaka kwazvo
Ngirosi dzoimba pamwepo, Nechita chevatsvene

title: 242 Rakakomborerwa Pfundo
content:
242 Rakakomborerwa Pfundo

Ngarikomborerwe, Pfundo-ro rerudo!
Rweukama hwe uKristu, sehwekumusoro

Pamberi pababa, To’nza minamato
Nedonzo, nezvidiso, zvedu zvese ngezvimwe

Tino’kowerana mitoro nenhamo!,
Tinonzwirana urombo mukutambudzika

Kuti tapatsana, Tinonzwa urombo
Kut’tine rusimbiro! Tichazo kumbana

title: 243 Muka, Mwoyo, Muka!
content:
243 Muka, Mwoyo, Muka!

Muka mwoyo wangu, Bvisa kutya kwese
Mupiro weropa vakapirwa ini
Ur’pamberi penyupo, Ur’pamberi penyu
zvino; Zita rangu raka nyorwa

Ari kumusoro, Kumirira ini
Nekundinunura, Neropa’ro rake
Iye Akatifira, Aparadza ropa rake
Riri pachigaro chemutsa

Madzvadzi mashanu, Epa Karivari
Ondinamatira, Nekundimirira
Oti musunungure, Otizve musunungure
Musarege mutadzi afe

Baba anomunzwa, Anoyera wake
Haanga musiyi, Mwana wake ega
Mweya wake wonzvika, Uchitaura uchiti
Wabarwa patsva kuna Mwari

245 Hakuna Zita SeraJesu

Tinoda zita raJesu, Kukunda amwe ese

CHORUS
Zita rake rinokunda amwe ese
Zita rake rinokunda amwe ese

Hakunazve rimwe zita, Kana mwoyo wasuwa
Hakunazve rimwe zita, Kana mwoyo wofara

Ndinovimba ndicham’ona, Ouya ane mbiri
Ndinovimba ndichatorwa, Mweya wangu wofara

Ndoda andikomborere, Mumazvi nemabasa

Ndoda kuti ndisimbire, Nekugara kwaari

246 Taura Inzvi Rimwe RaJesu

Inzvi rimwe naJesu, rinotibatsira
Inzvi duku naJesu, imba unamate

247 Ridza Matare Ekudenga

Mweya wapumhuka wadzoka

Mbiri ngirosi dzinoimba
Mbiri marimba anorira
Hondo yekudenga senyanza huru
Yoimba vasununguka

content:
248 Jesu WeNazareta Arikupfuura

Wungano iyi ngeyenyi, Irikukasika kwazvo?
Kuungana nguva dzese Mhere mhere’yi ngeyenyi
Ungano yakapindura,Ndi Jesu ari kupfuura
Ungano yakapindura,Ndi Jesu ari kupfuura

Ndiyaniko uyu Jesu, Anomhanyirwa nevese?
Mweninyiko anogona, Kutora ungano yese?
Manzvi akapindura zve,Ndi Jesu arikupfuura
Manzvi akapindura zve,Ndi Jesu arikupfuura

Jesu! uya ayifamba, Mukati mevane nhamo
Wachiunza kuna iye, Varwere kuzoponeswa
Bofu rakafara kunzwa, Ndi Jesu ari kupfuura
Bofu rakafara kunzwa, Ndi Jesu ari kupfuura

Anotibatsira nekutiraramisa, Nguva dzose

Ngati simuke tidane Jesu weNazareta

Nemwi makapumhuka, Uyayi muzopiwa tsitsi

Imwi vaedzwi vuyayi, Jesu weNazareta uyo

Uchafuratirwa naye, Iwe urikumuramba
Vanonoka vanonoka, Jesu weNazareta apfuura
Vanonoka vanonoka, Jesu weNazareta apfuura

249 Kwasara Makumi Mapfumbamwe

Kure kune mufudzi vakanaka

Mufudzi akati imwe hapana, Yakapumhukira musango
Kana nzira yakashatisa sei, Ndo’enda kugwenga kundotsvaka
Ndoenda kugwenga, kundotsvaka

Hwemvurayo, yakabirwa Kuti awane hwayi yake,
Kure kure kugwenga yakachema Yavapetyo nekuda kuti ife
Kure Kure kugwenga yakachema Yavapetyo nekuda kuti ife

Tenzi iri ropa rabvakupiko, Rataona pamakomo
Rakateukira akarasika Asi mufudzi amudzora
Kongenyi maoko ane madzvadzi, Akabaiwa neminzwa usiku
Akabaiwa neminzwa usiku

Makomo ese arikutinhira, Nekunzwika mumawere
Kudaidzira kunobva kudenga, Farayi hwai yaonekwa
Ngirosi dzinoimba pachigaro, Ngekuti hwayi yavamwa
Farayi ngekuti hwai yavanwa

title: 250 Musakundwe Nezviyedzo
content:
250 Musakundwe Nezviyedzo

Musakundwe nezvi yedzo zvakaipa
Kukunda kumwe kunokupa simba
Kana semurume, Kunda ruchiva
Unangise Jesu, unobatsirwa

CHORUS
Kumbira muponesi, kuti akubatsire
Anoda kubatsira, unozobatsirwa

Unangise Jesu, unobatsirwa

Vakurira vanopiwa chiremba
Tichazokurira nerudairo
Tinopiwa simba nam’ponesi
Unangise Jesu, unobatsirwa

title: 251 Kuchema Hakundi Ponesi
content:
251 Kuchema Hakundi Ponesi

Handinga ponesvi, kana dai ndicheme,
Hazvinga bvisi kutya, Kana kubvisa zvivi,
Kuchema inhando

CHORUS
Jesu akandifira, Pamuti akatambura;
Anondisunungura, Ndiye anogona

Basa \‘ribatsiri

Kurindir’ inhando

Chete rudairo, kana Kristu m’ponesi,
Nebasa Rake rese, Tibatsirenyi Tenzi,
Muti ponesewo

title: 252 Mweya Yatambudzwa Uyai
content:
252 Mweya Yatambudzwa Uyai

Uya mweya yatambudzwa, Tenzi anemutsa,
Muchazopiwa zororo, Mukamusimbira

CHORUS
Musimbire, musimbire, M’simbire zvino
Ane rudo ane rudo, Unoponeswa

Jesu aparadza ropa, Kuti komborera
Chipinda zvino muropa, Kuti ucheneswe

Hunde Jesu ndiyo nzira, Idi nezororo,
Daira zvino kwaari, Unokomborerwa

Uya muchita choyera, Ugashire mutsa
Ugare munyika iyo, Izere rufaro

title: 253 Izraeri Mufudzi Akanaka
content:
253 Izraeri Mufudzi Akanaka

Tarisa Izraeri, Mufudzi weidi
Anodana zvakanaka, Hwai dzake duku!

Ati Dzibvumire, Kuti dziuye kwandiri
Ndiye anokomborera, Tenzi we ngirosi

Tinounza nekutenda,Tenzi chikotsayi
Zvinotava nerufaro,Tava wenyu chose

title: 254 Kudza Zita RaJehova
content:
254 Kudza Zita RaJehova

Simukanyi mese, Murikudze zita ra Jehova
Taurayi nebasa rerudo rwake,
Netsitsi dzake ihuru kwazvo

Reganyi hwamanda imukudze, Nebopoto guru;
Reganyi marinda ese amukudze;
Manzwi azare nezita rake

Apo muchim’kudza, Ridzisanyi zvese zvinakidze;
Anopa upenyu, mweya imupe mbiri;
Yake huru, m’kudzenyi Tenzi

title: 255 Ndinomudai Jesu
content:
255 Ndinomudai Jesu

Ndinomudayi Jesu, Ndiri’ye murombo
Mweni ne mufambi, Handina neupfumi
Ndoda rudo rwaJesu, Ruzondinyaradza
Nekunditungamira, Muve simba rangu

Ndoda mwoyo waJesu, Mundipewo mutsa
Ndionese zviyedzo, Neurombo hwangu
Ndinoda Mweya m’tsvene, Ugondidzidzisa
Undionese Jesu, Muponesi wangu

Ndinomudayi Jesu, Ndichamuonayi,
Muri murarabungu, Pachigaro chenyu,
Pamwe nevana venyu, Ndichafara kwazvo
Kuimba murukudzo, Nekuona Tenzi

title: 256 Mwari Mubatsiri
content:
256 Mwari Mubatsiri

Mwari mubatsiri wedu, Nesimbiro yedu
Bako redu munhamodzo, Musha une mbiri

Mubvutero reumambo, Ndoona zororo
Handingatyi nechiroba, Kuti ndii nemwi

Kare musati masika, Makomo, nepasi
Imwi makange mavapo, Moveko narini

Kwamuri churu, Chemakore chinofananaNeusiku humwe,Kana mangwanani mamwe

title: 257 Mira Usingatenheki
content:
257 Mira Usingatenheki

Mira usingatenheki, Umire segomo
Mwey’ unosimbira Tenzi, Unosimba sedombo

Hakuna chimwe, Chingachengeta zvakanaka
Kupfuura maoko, Anerudo aJesu

Itirayi zvakanaka, Vanomusimbira
Vanozorora muidi,Varipamitemo

title: 258 Kune Rudairo Rumwe
content:
258 Kune Rudairo Rumwe

Kune rudairo rumwe,Handizhinjiba kwete
Rwuri chishangu chaMwari
Runoda mabasa chete

O Tenzi regererayi,Mtemo wenyu wasvibiswa;
Iwo wakachena asi,
Chitema chausvibisa

Sunungura kusachema, Bvisa kusachema m’mwoyo
Tibatsire kuchengeta
M’temo wenyu wese Tenzi

title: 259 Tichasangana Mhiri Kwe Rwizi
content:
259 Tichasangana Mhiri Kwe Rwizi

Tichasangana parwizi, Uko kusina bopoto?
Kune kupenya narini, Nerufaro rwemweya

CHORUS
Tichazosangana, mhiriyo kweuru rwizi
Uko kusina dambudzo, Tosanganayo here?

Tosangana pachitsuwa, Apo mhepo yazopera
Tosangana nerufaro, Pamahombekombeyo

Tozosangana kumusha, Kwazara nekupenya
Kwakavakwa nematombo, Nezvinokosha

Tozosangana naTenzi, Apo achauya pano?
Tingazive rudo rwake, Nekuzogara naye

CHORUS
Tichazosangana, mhiriyo kweuru rwizi
Uko kusina dambudzo, Tosanganayo here?

title: 260 Beulah Nyika Yakanaka
content:
260 Beulah Nyika Yakanaka

Ndiri kufamba munyika, Musina nechiro
Asi imwi makazadza, Nzira nemaruva
Nyika iyi yeBeulah, Yakanaka kwazvo
Nokuti ndinaye Tenzi, Zuva nesikati

CHORUS
Nyika yakanaka kwazvo, ndinoidisisa
Nyika iyi yechitsidzo ndiri kuivona

Hakuna nebvute rose, Kana nedimazve
Mbiri yenyu inovepo, Zuva nevusiku
Nzvimbo dzakanaka, Dzinoimba nengirozi
Dzino nzvikwa kwese kwese, Dzondifadza ini

Ndozofamba murufaro, Kumusha wedenga

Tidzidze nemi

Ndichazofamba munzira yake
Inoenda kudenga’yo
Maziso kufunda Bhaibheri
Nerudo rwake Kristu

Ndine mwoyo wekumupa Jesu
Mweya umwe aponese
Upenyu humwe murusando
Zvese zvangu ngezvakewo

title: 293 Gogo, Gogo
content:
293 Gogo, Gogo

Gogo, gogo, ndiani? Arindira akanaka!
Mufambi weumambo zve Asati awonekwa
A! mweya wangu, zaruravo mwoyo
Chishamiso chipinde’mo mukati

Gogo, gogo, Achipo, Arindira, Oshamisa
Handinyore kuzarura, zvo zvite zvakurisa
Zvadzikisa midzi yazvo, Kutenderedza
m’siwo; Kuti usazarure

Gogo, gogo, Achipo? Arindira, Akanaka
Anogogodza musiwo, nechiremba
chemhinzwa; Arindira nemutsa, Tenzi
akarindira; Woreg’ aripo here

title: 294 Fukidzwa Neupenyu Hwake
content:
294 Fukidzwa Neupenyu Hwake

Nangisa Jesu, Hana chitema;Upenyu hwake, hwapiwe’ni
Upenyu hwangu nechitema, Hwafukwa nehwake kuchena

CHORUS
Ndofukidzwa neupenyu hwake
Ndozoziva upenyu hwese
Upenyu hwangu hwechitema
Hwafukwa nehwake huchena

Zvironda zvechitema zvadzama, Zvakatsvuka, Mweya unotya
O kufukidzwa nemwi Jesu, Ndosunungurwa nemutemo

Ndoda kuziva rusununguro! Jesu ondipa nguwo chena
Ndaigashira, yangu ndarasa, Ndinopfeka upenyu hwenyu

Ndadzorerwa nerufo rwangu, Ndaruramiswa nemwi Tenzi
Ndaereswa neinzwi renyu, Ndozogashira mbiri yenyu

title: 295 Da’Dzira Hondo
content:
295 Da’Dzira Hondo

Da’Dzira Hondo, mhandu yapetyo, Sim’dza mureza waTenzi
Pfeka chishangu, Simbayi mese, Simbirayi painzwi rake

CHORUS
Vakani simudzayi mureza
Gadzirira, nyeweranayi
Enda mberi, Daidza Hosana!
Kristu m’tungamiri wehondo

Farayi mukumbane nemhandu, Idi rinokurirazve
Chishangu nemureza zvipenye, Tichakurira, hatitadzi

O Mwari wevese chitinzwayi, Tibatsireyi netsitsi
Hondo yazopera, takurira, Tingazopfekawo zviremba

title: 296 Nditungamire Muponesi
content:
296 Nditungamire Muponesi

Tenzi nditungamire, Munzira yangu yose
Ndachengetwa, ndinemwi, Ndichagara murudo

CHORUS
Tenzi, kuti ndisarasike m’nzira
Mukuchinja kwenguva, Nditungamire Tenzi

Muribako’ro rangu, Cham’pupuri chauya
Handizotyi ndinemwi, Ndinosimbira imwi

Ndisvitse kumagumo, Cham’pupuri chapera
Ndozosvika nyika’yo, Masodzi opukutwa

title: 297 Zvakaroverwa Pamuchinjiko
content:
297 Zvakaroverwa Pamuchinjiko

Kwava noumwe wakafa panzwimbo yangu, Kuti mweya sowang’ upone
Wabvuma kufamba m’nzira yemuchinjiko, Kuti asunungure ini

CHORUS
Zvakaroverwa’po, Pam’chinjiko wake
O zvizhinji sey’ atakura!, Nekurwadzwa kose;
Jesu atakura, zvese zvitema zvangu

Anemutsa, rudo, nenyasha kuneni, Anochenesa mwoyo wangu
Handichina kuraswa, ngasununguka, Zvaroverwa pam’chinjiko

Ndichabatirira kuna muponesi, Ndichafara ndiri murwendo
Ndine rwiyo momwoyo nepamuromo, Zvitema zvangu zvazobviswa

title: 298 Handichina Nechangu, Zvese Ngezvenyu
content:
298 Handichina Nechangu, Zvese Ngezvenyu

Inguva inorwadza, Zvakadini yeurombo
Apo ndati kuna Jesu, Zvese zvese ndezvangu
Hapana nechenyuba, Zvese zvese ndezvangu
Apo ndati kuna Jesu, Hapana nechenyuba

Asi’ ye akandiwana, Ndakam’vona pamuti
Nemwoyo wangu ukati, Zvino zvimwe ndezvangu
Nezvimwevo ndezvako, Zvino zvimwe ndezvangu
Nemwoyo wangu ukati, Nezvimwe ndezvako

Misi yose mutsa wake, Unondibatsira, wondipfavisa
Ndichiti zvangu zvova zvishoma, Zvako zvova zvizhinji
Zvangu zvava zvishoma, Wondipfavisa ndichiti
Zvako zvava zvizhinji

Rudo rwenyu rwakakwira, Nekudzama kupinda
Nyanza nedenga zvino-ka, Handichina nechangu
Zvese zvazova zvenyu, Handichina nechangu
Zvese zvazova zvenyu, Tenzi rudo rwakurira

title: 299 Garai Makafara
content:
299 Garai Makafara

Mwoyo yedu ngaifare, Tinogununguneyi
Kana ivo Baba vedu, Vachingotichengeta?

CHORUS
Ngatifare, ngatifare, Tinovona kupenya
Nzira yebasa yakanakisa, Kana tichifara

Apo achitungamira, Kana izvo zvitema
Zvinozotikurirazve, Jesu anotibatsira

Kana tichirega basa, Tino rwadziwa mwoyo
Mumvuri unoswedera, Kuzodzinga rufaro

O! vatsvene vanogara, Vachifarisisazve
Nzira yavo inopenya, Idayi zvakanaka

title: 300 Zororo Ravakaneta
content:
300 Zororo Ravakaneta

Kune musha wevatsvene, Vozorora munyika
Uko muponesi wangu, Akandigadzirira

CHORUS
Kune zororo ikoko, kunezororo ikoko
Kune zororo ikoko, ravakaneta
Pamhendero yeJordani, Nemumunda weEdeni
Panomuti weupenyu kunezororo

Andigadzirira imba, Inogara narini
Kwandichazogara hangu, Kunyika iyo itsva

Hakuzovi nekurwara, Hakunazve urombo
Asi ndicha pfekedzwazve, Chiremba cheupenyu

Hakuzovi norufu zve, Rumborera ruchabva,
Vaponeswa vachafara kuna Jesu ouya.

Imbayi vadyi venhaka, Farai muchienda
Muchazozarurirwazve, Mazambara eZioni
